div.p:
General Brock is dead!
Americans hold the Heights.

We are but 100 men.
They are thousands!

Our future was determined
by our oath, not the Americans.
This land does not belong to them.
Remember the fame of ancient warriors.
Let not their numbers frighten you.
I know in my heart, before the sun falls
Behind these hills, our enemy will have fallen before you!
How long can we hold them?
At the Battle of Queenston Heights,
80 Grand River warriors, including John Norton and John Brant,
Held off the Americans for hours to take back the Heights.
